articles.description: Liz Lochhead’s Scots verse spits wit and venom as male power meets female determination with operatic intensity, in this National Theatre of Scotland staging
articles.content: Everybody is larger than life in Michael Boyds tremendous staging of Liz Lochheads play, still queasily contentious 2,500 years after the Euripides original. In one sense, this is literally the case.… [+2121 chars]
